title: Oishinbo: Nichibei Kome Sensou
original_name: 美味しんぼ　日米コメ戦争
opening_song: "Dang Dang Ki ni Naru! (Dang Dang 気になる!)" by Yuma Nakamura
sinopse: The Oishinbo gang takes time off from the normal culinary wars to get involved with a political dispute about American rice imports. The economic conflict between a pushy US Senator from California and a nationalistic Japanese politician is further complicated by concerns about the cumulative effect of pesticide use in both American and Japanese agriculture.
